summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mobile Coach View redesign. Backend API (13/13 tests passed) and Frontend UI tests passed. All features working correctly with real Strava data and EN/FR bilingual support. Session type card (Easy/Sustained/Hard) replaced comparison card.
passed_tests: GET /api/coach/workout-analysis/{workout_id} returns 200 with correct response structure
coach_summary is plain language, max 18-20 words, no numbers overload
intensity card has pace (7:19/km), avg_hr (128), label (above_usual/below_usual/normal)
load card has distance_km (8.2), duration_min (60), direction (up/down/stable)
session_type card has label (easy/sustained/hard) - NEW: replaces comparison card
insight is max 2 sentences, no jargon (no Z2/Z4, no physiology)
guidance is optional, soft wording, only if unusually intense
French version returns French content with no numbers in coach_summary
UI shows 3 compact cards in a row (grid-cols-3 layout verified)
Type card shows Hard with color coding (text-chart-1 bg-chart-1/10, rgba(60,131,246,0.1))
View detailed analysis button navigates to /coach and triggers deep analysis
Ask the coach button navigates to /coach
Page is readable in under 10 seconds (1.0 scrolls needed, fits in viewport)
Good text contrast (dark bg rgb(5,5,5), light text rgb(237,237,237))
French translations work correctly (Intensit√©, Charge, Type, Difficile, Au-dessus habituel, etc.)
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - session_type calculation uses HR intensity + load + zone distribution
i18n translations are complete for both EN and FR including new session_types (easy/sustained/hard)
data-testid attributes properly added for coach-summary, coach-insight, guidance, deep-analysis-btn, ask-coach-btn
Mobile-first design is well implemented with minimal scrolling required (1.0 scrolls)
seed_data_creation: None - using real Strava data synced from user's account (workout ID: strava_17130033093)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile Coach View redesign is complete and working. Session type card (Easy/Sustained/Hard) replaced the comparison card. Uses GPT-5.2 via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY for AI-generated coach summary, insight, and guidance. Real Strava data is available in MongoDB (119 workouts synced). The workout analysis compares current workout to 14-day baseline of same type. Signal cards show Intensity (pace, HR, label), Load (distance, duration, direction), and Type (easy/sustained/hard with color coding). French translations are complete. View full analysis button navigates to /coach?analyze={id} which triggers deep analysis.
